thread.title: Gold slides to eight-month low
thread.title_full: Gold slides to eight-month low | MENAFN.COM

author: ProactiveInvestors  Australia
title: Gold slides to eight-month low
text:
(MENAFN - ProactiveInvestors)Gold futures settled at their lowest level in about eight months and stand at what one analyst called a “technical tipping point.”

Driving the price lower was upbeat U.S. economic data and comments from the Federal Reserve continue to point to an interest-rate hike this year. 

Gold for August delivery lost 0.3% to settle at US1143.90 an ounce on the Comex in New York.

Based on the most-active contracts that was the lowest settlement since November 6. 

Fed Chairwoman Janet Yellen yesterday said she expects the U.S. economy to strengthen over the rest of 2015 and put the central bank on a path to raise interest rates at some point this year.

The number of U.S. jobless claims fell sharply in the week ended July 11 but a separate report showed business among manufacturers in the Philadelphia region grew in July at a much slower pace than expected.
